tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: I took online Nutrition. She\'s a very tough teacher and grades hard. The tests are hard because the powerpoints and lectures and study guides are just so full of a ton of info for just a 50 question test. She gives a lot of homework and assignments to help keep your grade afloat if you fail the tests. You have to be fully dedicated to this class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Took ms Davis for anatomy and she\'s a good teacher but don\'t expect to just pass by listening to lecture this class takes studying and dedication! It\'s not an easy A but the teacher isn\'t to blame if you do bad she explains everything and gives you study guides and an extra credit opportunity. Overall I would definelty take her again

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Mrs.Davis is a very sweet & caring teacher but she means business.She helps out as much as possible by putting everything you will need on black board before the semester begins. It\'s up to the student how well you do in this course by that I mean how well you pay attention,your attendance, and your studying habits. She was a GREAT teacher and fair

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Too many trick questions, I rather be getting all the info I need instead of sitting trying to figure out ONE question. This class is hard, take at your own risk.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I took this class as an online class and found it to be quite difficult. She posts power points of the chapters online but also asks questions from the book that aren\'t in her notes. She asks trick questions that are confusing. I have made high A\'s in all of my classes and made a B- in her nutrition class. I worked extremely hard for a B-.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I took this class fall "08". She was an EXCELLENT teacher to me and she will go over the info if you dont understand. she ask if every one understand before moving to next chapter this is your time to ask questions . Do quizzes, homework, and study real hard and you are sure to pass. Take her if you want to learn

tag_professor: Tough Grader (3)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Ms. Davis is such a sweet and caring Biology instructor. She will work with you whenever you go and ask her for help. She makes her classes fun and interesting. She never went to class in a bad mood. Overall, she is a great A&P as well as a Nutrition tracher. She is there to listen to you if you have any problems or concerns.
